name: Samuel HARPER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA CO.
name_abbreviation: Harper v. Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia Co.

parties: Samuel HARPER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA CO.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 13th day of October, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
123 A.3d 1059
Samuel HARPER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA CO.
No. 106 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 13, 2015.
